themes: need for increased funding for new businesses and creatives
lack of opportunities for smaller or emerging artists
cost of living challenges for Black and Brown creatives
key_phrases: More funding opportunities for new businesses
more opportunities for smaller artists to break in
instead of choosing the same 4 DJs and Bands
Lower the cost of living for Black and Brown creatives
barriers_identified: limited funding for new businesses and creative entities
lack of access for smaller artists
repetitive selection of the same artists
high cost of living for Black and Brown creatives
solutions_proposed: Increase funding opportunities for new businesses and creatives
Create more opportunities for smaller artists to participate
Diversify artist selection beyond the same 4 DJs and Bands
Lower the cost of living for Black and Brown creatives
Prioritize equity over equality in support measures
